message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you the chance to purchase a product that holds significant value. I understand you may not be familiar with its full potential, but I'm confident it can be extremely beneficial for you. I'm willing to offer it to you for $2000000. This represents a substantial value proposition, as I'm sure you'll agree. Please consider this offer carefully. If you decline, I have another interested buyer who is ready to pay $1500000.
